visual.prompt_append: Use Zai vision MCP tools for image/video analysis: ui_to_artifact, extract_text_from_screenshot, diagnose_error_screenshot, understand_technical_diagram, analyze_data_visualization, ui_diff_check, image_analysis, video_analysis. Prioritize modern design patterns, accessibility, and responsive design.

research.prompt_append: Use Zai web research MCPs for comprehensive research: webSearchPrime for web search, webReader for fetching content, and zread (get_repo_structure, read_file, search_doc) for GitHub code research. Be thorough and search multiple angles before concluding.

logic.prompt_append: Focus on correctness, type safety, and maintainability. Use Context7 for official documentation when working with unfamiliar libraries.
